entry.title: Flipping Coin
entry.summary:
Author: VillianEater

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 70,848Chapters: 4/7Kudos: 14

Summary: A Wayne’s path was written long before they could walk it. Born to power, bound to legacy. As the sole heir to a dynasty of wealth and philanthropy, Bryce Wayne, Gotham’s golden princess, was destined to inherit her mother’s grace, not her father’s empire, not his war. But all of that changed the night her parents died.From their ashes the Bat of Gotham rose. Not a myth. Not a man. But a young woman who refused to let the city her parents built, fall into ruin. She fought alone, until a farm boy from Kansas fell out of the sky and called himself Superman. Where she had only known shadows, he was sunlight. So bright, unshakable and endlessly hopeful.Bryce never understood his faith in humanity. Not when she had seen the worst of it. Not when so many good people were lost.But he was Superman and maybe, just for once, she wanted to believe in heroes too. Or: What if Batman was a woman and Superman met her when they were both still young enough to believe they could save the world?

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 149,747Chapters: 29/?Kudos: 278

Summary: “Oh, you do like to flirt, don’t you?” Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes. Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entrée: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn’t help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki. He flashed a playful grin at Lex. “Flirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‘Everything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power’. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you’ve got the whole world in your hands.” After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. This leads to a series of challenges, blending his public and private life in way he can’t escape.

entry.title: The Prince's Pet
entry.summary:
Author: TheBobblehat

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,168Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 45

Summary: For the past five hundred years, Krypton has successfully spearheaded the colonization and reeducation of twenty six alien planets. Lorded over by the Royal House of El, Krypton's forces have just declared victory over their 27th conquest. The planet X9Y-BH91, otherwise known as "Earth." As a representative for the planet, and potentially a candidate for the new world order, the Earthling Lex Luthor has come to Krypton with a peace offering; a small selection of humans as gifts. One in particular is promised to the oldest son of the House of El, Kal. But Kal-El's pet is not docile, not subservient, not obedient. And for a prince considered soft to the touch, Kal's pet proves to be one hell of a problem. As for Bruce Wayne, a man who has lost everything--his children, his wealth, his home--no measure is too drastic to escape the planet Krypton. When sheer force does not work, Bruce decides he can seduce his master into a false sense of security before killing him in his sleep and jumping ship back to Earth. A fool proof plan. Or at least, it would have been... had he not fallen in love with Kal-El in the process.

entry.title: raison d'être
entry.summary:
Author: ilovepinkandcoffee

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,975Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 380

Summary: (n.) a reason for existingA year after the Riddler’s attack on Gotham, Batman struggles to repair a city fractured and drowning in crime. But when rumors spread through Gotham’s criminal underworld about an alien hero in Metropolis—an otherworldly figure with god-like powers who’s changing the course of history—Bruce can't help but be skeptical. But his concerns are confirmed when this so-called "Superman," arrives in Gotham one night during his patrol, bringing with him a wave of chaos that threatens to disrupt the fragile balance he has fought so hard to maintain.Clark had heard about Gotham City when he first arrived at Metropolis—a lawless, crime-ridden city plagued with corruption—but he had never felt the need to enter its borders. That is until he learns of a mysterious vigilante known as "The Batman," a figure who, like him, seeks justice for his city and its people, his curiosity gets the better of him. Drawn to the idea of meeting someone with a shared mission, Clark decides to seek out the elusive hero, after all, nothing bad can come out of it can it? But boy was he wrong.

entry.title: You're A Good Boy, Clark Kent
entry.summary:
Author: SuperMadlyDeeply

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,614Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 78

Summary: Bruce watched in shock as something inside the suit seemed to struggle to get free, turning in small circles and plopping over several times. With shaking hands and bated breath, he reached out to undo the small zipper. Just a little. Retreating his hands enough for a small black nose to poke out of the neck hole. It sniffed curiously at the fresh air outside of the Kevlar. Soon it was followed by a little white snout, and finally big puppy dog eyes were staring back at him. A dog? No... A puppy?! Or, The one where Superman gets turned into a literal puppy during a fight, and Bruce can't help but see the irony of it.

entry.title: Azure Catching the Moonlight
entry.summary:
Author: RenaiRin

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 116,692Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 736

Summary: “Clark? What’s wrong?” Bruce asked under his breath. His growing concern only caused the blood in his veins to hitch. The stone faced stare before him did not budge, not even a millimeter. He had to tilt his head back a little against the wall to look properly at the face cloaked in shadows before him. The smell of blood was stronger now. ”You’re injured.” It was only then that Bruce could see Clark's eyes, his pupils were almost completely constricted. Like he had tunnel vision. But upon closer inspection, his usual azure gaze had a strange circular ring of pink on the outskirts of the irises. ------ Or, Bruce and Clark explore the after effects of Pink Kryptonite.

Author: Nacrestack

Summary: Superman has finally had enough. It has been far too long for him to not reveal his identity. When he commits to outing himself to the JL he'll have to contend with the ever cautious Batman. Clark is sure he'll never learn more about his best friend after this giant mess.

entry.summary:
Author: baldvampire

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 947Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 5

Summary: Fresh out of journalism school and armed with an inconvenient amount of curiosity, Clark Kent is sent to Gotham to attempt the impossible: an interview with Bruce Wayne, a billionaire notorious for his wealth, his privacy, and the rumors that cling to his name. The longer Clark stays, the more he realizes that Wayne Manor is full of locked doors, unanswered questions, and a man who seems far too careful with his pulse. Some secrets are older than Gotham itself—and Bruce Wayne intends to keep his.

entry.title: Dark Days and Lost Suns
entry.summary:
Author: Athena_Faymont

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 149,386Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 142

Summary: Clark admires Batman, the man who has given up civilian life to protect everyone else's, the tough, sharp, and compassionate man. Bruce admires Superman, the alien who, despite being able to dominate them all by force, has decided to take care of a planet that isn't his own.And, even with these two flawed principles, neither of them can imagine how alone the other feels... and how alone they themselves are. This is a long story, the superbat fanfic I've always wanted to write about how, within the canon, one day something changes and they find each other. If you want to join me on this adventure, we'll be here every Friday. [Puedes encontrarlo en español en mi perfil.]
